meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of the Gambia.
meanings.sent1: In the Gambia, you can buy many things with just a few dalasis.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for dalasis at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The dalasis in my pocket seemed to whisper, 'Spend me wisely.'
meanings.sent4: Her savings grew like a field of dalasis after the rainy season.
meanings.sent5: The shiny dalasis sparkled in the sunlight, tempting me to spend them.

meanings.sent1: I counted the dalasis in my wallet and realized I had enough to buy a gift.
meanings.sent2: The vendor handed me a handful of dalasis as my change.
meanings.sent3: The dalasis jingled in my pocket like tiny bells.
meanings.sent4: The pile of dalasis on the table looked like a small mountain of wealth.
meanings.sent5: Each of the shiny dalasis represented a small victory in saving money.
